# Perils & Princesses **Perils & Princesses** is an **unofficial** character sheet for Outrider Creative's TTRPG. If you have any questions or comments, please contact Vialmada.

## Features - The Avatar Image is used for Character picture: 200px for both height and width - Virtue rolls have Advantage/Disadvantage/Normal options - Encumbrance is limited to Resolve and is tracked by checkbox ticks. An Encumbrance total appears beside the Weary Ailment and will trigger that condition when Resolve is exceeded - Gift Dice rolls prompt for the number of dice and declare Mishap on doubles - Critical Damage, doubled dice, occur when a '1' is rolled to hit
